subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[raise]]; to [[rear]]; to [[bring up]]
# to [[support]]
# 81st [[tetragram]] of the [[Taixuanjing]]; "[[foster]]ing" ([[𝍖]])
# {{lb|zh|Sichuanese}} you (formal)
